name: Hallowe'en: Night of the Misty Manor
name_original: Hallowe'en: Night of the Misty Manor
description:
It's Hallowe'en, and 17-year-old Eilidh is looking forward to a party at her neighbours' house.  But when she's tasked with taking the younger children out guising, the evening turns out to be more complicated than expected!

Set in Edinburgh in 1987, the story features Scottish Hallowe'en traditions galore. Everyone is welcome at the Reid family Hallowe'en party, so come on in...
